metadata.title: BST'S Eucalyptus Oil - 1 fl oz,(Solstice)
description: For the temporary relief of minor aches and pains of muscles and joints due to: simple backache, arthritis, strains, bruises, and sprains. Warnings For external use only. Do not use on wounds, other than as directed as such use may be dangerous, and on damaged skin. When using this product avoid contact with the eyes or mucous membranes, and do not bandage tightly. Stop use and ask a doctor if condition worsens, symptoms persist for more than 7 days, or symptoms clear up and occur again within a few days.Active Ingredients Eucalyptus Oil Suggested Use Adults and children 2 years of age and older: Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. Children under 2 years of age: Do not use, consult a physician.
